Can you provide more details of where you were suspended to perform the 
evaluation (so we can reproduce the problem). (Assigning to Jared)

I have just released the code into the CVS repository. Look into WelcomeEditor-
>WelcomeListener.keyReleased(). I was evaluating the keyCode of the event.
Put a breakpoint on this method, open the Welcome Editor and then hit tab.
Just got it again trying to evaluate SWT.LF in the debugger.

The problem here was our handling (or lack thereof) of evaluations in the
context of a local type in a field declaration.

We've added code to handle this case.
